ai-patthana14.1:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana14.1:2.1_0: For it is not cause or reason to give rise to the reason for the sake of the aggregates, and thoughts associated with mind.
ai-patthana14.1:2.1_2: for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of a cause,
ai-patthana14.1:2.1_3: roots don’t give rise to causes and conditions;
ai-patthana14.1:3.1_0: for the sake of Teaching, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.1:3.1_1: Enjoying the Teaching, not with the cause or reason,
ai-patthana14.1:4.1_0: cause or condition, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.1:4.1_1: cause or reason for the sake of not cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.1:4.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.1:5.1_3: and also associated with the arrows,
ai-patthana14.1:7.1_0: the cause or condition for the reason it is not the reason for the teaching,
ai-patthana14.1:10.1_1: Afterwards, nine faculties belonging to the nine faculties, three results in the five faculties, and three nine faculties, three nine faculties, three nine faculties, five powers, and the nine faculties, the five spiritual powers. ...
